# SEDU Single-PCB Component Report

**Project:** SEDU Single-PCB Feed Drill
**Revision:** C.4b
**Generated:** 2025-11-14 18:52:14

**AUTO-GENERATED from design_database.yaml**

DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE DIRECTLY - Edit design_database.yaml and run: `python scripts/generate_all.py`

---

## Major ICs

### U1: ESP32-S3-WROOM-1-N16R8
- **Manufacturer:** Espressif
- **Description:** Dual-core MCU with 16MB flash, 8MB PSRAM
- **Supply Voltage:** 3.3V
- **Datasheet:** https://docs.espressif.com/projects/esp-hardware-design-guidelines/en/latest/esp32s3/
- **Notes:** PSRAM module - GPIO35-37 unavailable

### U2: DRV8353RS
- **Manufacturer:** Texas Instruments
- **Description:** 3-phase BLDC gate driver with integrated CSAs
- **VM Range:** 6V - 100V
- **DVDD:** 3.3V
- **Datasheet:** https://www.ti.com/lit/ds/symlink/drv8353.pdf
- **Notes:** CSA gain locked to 20V/V via SPI

### U3: DRV8873-Q1
- **Manufacturer:** Texas Instruments
- **Description:** Automotive H-bridge motor driver (PH/EN mode)
- **Supply Voltage:** [4.5, 37]V
- **Datasheet:** https://www.ti.com/lit/ds/symlink/drv8873.pdf
- **Notes:** Continuous 3.5A, 6.5A peak with thermal management

### U4: LMR33630ADDAR
- **Manufacturer:** Texas Instruments
- **Description:** Synchronous buck converter (24V->3.3V single-stage)
- **Output Voltage:** 3.3V
- **Output Current:** 3.0A
- **Datasheet:** https://www.ti.com/lit/ds/symlink/lmr33630.pdf
- **Notes:** 5V rail eliminated - direct 24V->3.3V conversion

### U6: LM5069-1
- **Manufacturer:** Texas Instruments
- **Description:** Hot-swap controller with auto-retry
- **Datasheet:** https://www.ti.com/lit/ds/symlink/lm5069.pdf
- **Notes:** Type -1 = auto-retry on fault

### U7: TPS22919
- **Manufacturer:** Texas Instruments
- **Description:** 5V 2A load switch (isolates USB rail)
- **Datasheet:** https://www.ti.com/lit/ds/symlink/tps22919.pdf

### U8: TLV75533
- **Manufacturer:** Texas Instruments
- **Description:** 500mA LDO (USB 5V -> 3.3V programming rail)
- **Output Voltage:** 3.3V
- **Output Current:** 0.5A
- **Datasheet:** https://www.ti.com/product/TLV755P

**Critical Component Details:**

- **R_CHIP_PU**: ESP32 CHIP_PU pull-up (ensures reliable boot)
  - Datasheet: Espressif Hardware Design Guidelines (MANDATORY)
- **C_CHIP_PU**: ESP32 CHIP_PU RC delay (power sequencing)
  - Datasheet: Espressif Hardware Design Guidelines (MANDATORY)
- **C_VDD_CPU**: ESP32 VDD3P3_CPU decoupling (pin 46)
- **C_VDD_RTC**: ESP32 VDD3P3_RTC decoupling (pin 20)
- **C_VDD_SPI**: ESP32 VDD_SPI decoupling
- **C_VDD3P3_1**: ESP32 VDD3P3 decoupling (pin 37)
- **C_VDD3P3_2**: ESP32 VDD3P3_0 decoupling (pin 39)
- **FB_VDDA**: ESP32 VDDA filter (improves ADC accuracy)
- **C_VDDA_10u**: ESP32 VDDA bulk capacitor
- **C_VDDA_100n**: ESP32 VDDA bypass capacitor
- **R_VBAT_TOP**: Battery voltage divider top (ADC1_CH0)
  - Calculation: 25.2V max -> 1.68V at ADC (within 3.5V range)
- **R_VBAT_BOT**: Battery voltage divider bottom

**Critical Component Details:**

- **C_DRV8353_VM1**: DRV8353 VM bypass capacitor
  - Datasheet: DRV8353RS datasheet Section 8.2.2 (MANDATORY)
- **C_DRV8353_VM2**: DRV8353 VM bulk capacitor
  - Datasheet: DRV8353RS datasheet Section 8.2.2 (>=10uF MANDATORY)
- **C_CPLCPH**: DRV8353 charge pump capacitor
- **C_VCP**: DRV8353 VCP bypass
- **C_VGLS**: DRV8353 VGLS bypass
- **C_DVDD**: DRV8353 DVDD bypass
- **RS_U**: Motor phase U current sense (Kelvin sense)
  - Calculation: 25A peak: P = I²R = 625*0.002 = 1.25W (5W rated, 300% margin)
  - Notes: K suffix = 5W rating (R suffix = 3W, insufficient)
- **RS_V**: Motor phase V current sense (Kelvin sense)
  - Calculation: 25A peak: P = I²R = 625*0.002 = 1.25W (5W rated, 300% margin)
- **RS_W**: Motor phase W current sense (Kelvin sense)
  - Calculation: 25A peak: P = I²R = 625*0.002 = 1.25W (5W rated, 300% margin)

| R_IPROPI | 1.00k | ERA-3AEB102V | DRV8873 IPROPI scaling | CRITICAL |

**Critical Component Details:**

- **R_ILIM**: DRV8873 current limit setting
  - Calculation: ILIM = 5200V / 1.58kΩ = 3.29A
  - Datasheet: DRV8873 datasheet Section 8.2.2.2
- **R_IPROPI**: DRV8873 IPROPI scaling
  - Calculation: V_IPROPI = (I_LOAD / 1100) * R_IPROPI
  - Datasheet: DRV8873 datasheet Section 8.2.2.3
- **C_DRV8873_VM1**: DRV8873 VM bypass capacitor
  - Datasheet: DRV8873 datasheet typical application (MANDATORY)
- **C_DRV8873_VM2**: DRV8873 VM bulk capacitor
  - Datasheet: DRV8873 datasheet typical application (MANDATORY)

### U4: LMR33630ADDAR

| Ref | Value | Part Number | Description | Criticality |
|-----|-------|-------------|-------------|-------------|
| C_BOOT | 100nF | GRM188R71H104KA93 | LMR33630 bootstrap capacitor | CRITICAL |
| C_VCC | 1uF | GRM188R71C105KA12 | LMR33630 VCC bypass | CRITICAL |
| L4 | 10uH | SRP1265-100M | LMR33630 inductor (24V->3.3V) | CRITICAL |
| RFBB | 43.2k | ERA-3AEB4322V | LMR33630 feedback bottom resistor | CRITICAL |
| RFBT | 100k | ERA-3AEB104V | LMR33630 feedback top resistor | CRITICAL |

**Critical Component Details:**

- **L4**: LMR33630 inductor (24V->3.3V)
- **C_BOOT**: LMR33630 bootstrap capacitor
  - Datasheet: LMR33630 datasheet typical application (MANDATORY)
- **C_VCC**: LMR33630 VCC bypass
  - Datasheet: LMR33630 datasheet typical application (MANDATORY)
- **RFBT**: LMR33630 feedback top resistor
  - Calculation: V_out = 0.8V * (1 + RFBT/RFBB)
- **RFBB**: LMR33630 feedback bottom resistor
  - Calculation: For 3.3V output with 0.8V ref

**Critical Component Details:**

- **RS_IN**: LM5069 current sense resistor
  - Calculation: ILIM = 55mV / 3.0mΩ = 18.3A
  - Datasheet: LM5069 datasheet Section 8.2.1
  - Notes: Replaces CSS2H-2728R-L003F (old part not available at distributors)
- **RUV_TOP**: LM5069 UV divider top (sets 18V UV threshold)
- **RUV_BOT**: LM5069 UV divider bottom
- **ROV_TOP**: LM5069 OV divider top (sets 27V OV threshold)
- **ROV_BOT**: LM5069 OV divider bottom
- **CDVDT**: LM5069 dV/dt control (limits inrush)

## Locked Design Values

These values are **FROZEN** and should not be changed without updating frozen state:

| Ref | Value | Reason |
|-----|-------|--------|
| CDVDT | 33nF | LM5069 dV/dt control (limits inrush) |
| C_CPLCPH | 47nF | DRV8353 charge pump capacitor |
| L4 | 10uH | LMR33630 inductor (24V->3.3V) |
| RFBB | 43.2k | For 3.3V output with 0.8V ref |
| RFBT | 100k | V_out = 0.8V * (1 + RFBT/RFBB) |
| ROV_BOT | 10k | LM5069 OV divider bottom |
| ROV_TOP | 221k | LM5069 OV divider top (sets 27V OV threshold) |
| RS_IN | 3.0m | ILIM = 55mV / 3.0mΩ = 18.3A |
| RS_U | 2.0m | 25A peak: P = I²R = 625*0.002 = 1.25W (5W rated, 300% margin) |
| RS_V | 2.0m | 25A peak: P = I²R = 625*0.002 = 1.25W (5W rated, 300% margin) |
| RS_W | 2.0m | 25A peak: P = I²R = 625*0.002 = 1.25W (5W rated, 300% margin) |
| RUV_BOT | 10k | LM5069 UV divider bottom |
| RUV_TOP | 140k | LM5069 UV divider top (sets 18V UV threshold) |
| R_ILIM | 1.58k | ILIM = 5200V / 1.58kΩ = 3.29A |
| R_IPROPI | 1.00k | V_IPROPI = (I_LOAD / 1100) * R_IPROPI |
| R_VBAT_BOT | 10k | Battery voltage divider bottom |
| R_VBAT_TOP | 140k | 25.2V max -> 1.68V at ADC (within 3.5V range) |
